description: Monday, November 27, 2017 (12:00 PM) - Tuesday, December 26, 2017 (4:00 PM) Location: Johnson Center  In support HIV awareness month, MedX will be distributing lollipops that have interesting facts about HIV and AIDS throughout the last week of November. Hope to see you all there.
creator: MedX Global
title: HIV/AIDS Awareness Kiosk Week

description: Monday, November 27, 2017 (12:00 PM - 1:00 PM) Location: Johnson Center, Dance Studio (ground floor) Co-sponsored by CWB and Mason Recreation, our weekly yoga for well-being practice helps you recalibrate body, mind, and spirit leading to greater focus, productivity, and well-being. No prior experience needed. Please bring your own yoga mat.
creator: Center for the Advancement of Well-Being
title: Yoga for Well-Being

description: Monday, November 27, 2017 (1:30 PM - 1:45 PM) Location: Johnson Center, #244 Take a break from your work or studies to join other Mason faculty, staff, and students in silent meditation together. Meditating can lead to many well-being benefits, from peace to concentration.
creator: Center for the Advancement of Well-Being
title: Silent Meditation

description: Monday, November 27, 2017 (2:00 PM - 5:00 PM) Location: Provisions Library We have weekly meetings for general task management and socialization of members in order to create a cohesive team to produce the murals in April! Don't worry about being late or leaving early, we would love to have you come whenever you can!
creator: Mural Brigade
title: Weekly Meeting

description: Monday, November 27, 2017 (7:00 PM - 10:00 PM) Location: JC Gold Room To promote our Spring Culture show, VSA is going to do a culture show interest event/ traditional dance workshop.
creator: Vietnamese Student Association
title: VSA Culture/Traditional Dance Workshop

description: Monday, November 27, 2017 (7:00 PM - 9:00 PM) Location: Engineer Building 4201 Cancelled  Come to our third general body meeting for the fall 2017 semester! Learn about upcoming events and projects for the organization. Like previously, there will be FREE FOOD, so be sure to be there! It will take place in ENGR 4201 from 7pm-9pm on Monday November 25th! Even if you haven't been to our other meetings, you're welcome to attend!
creator: Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers
title: GBM #3 (Cancelled)

description: Monday, November 27, 2017 (7:30 PM - 8:30 PM) Location: SUB 1 ROOM 3A Join My Natural as we recap the semester, enjoy festive treats, and get creative! Don't forget to wear your favorite Holiday sweater!
creator: My Natural at George Mason
title: 12 Moments of My Natural

description: Monday, November 27, 2017 (7:30 PM - 9:30 PM) Location: HUB VIP Room 2 Interested in creative writing? Want to improve your writing, editing, or critique skills? Perhaps you have a writing assignment for class that you want to get checked over before you submit it. UES's Weekly Creative Writing Workshops provide students and members with a chance to engage with other writers outside of class and critique each others' work. We meet every Wednesday from 7:30 to 9:30 in HUB VIP Room 2. We are a supportive, creative community of writers, readers, and editors working together to reach stronger drafts through revision. Bring your fiction, poetry, or creative nonfiction for collaborative critique. All are welcome regardless of major, course of study, or experience!
creator: Undergraduate English Society
title: UES Weekly Creative Writing Workshop

description: Monday, November 27, 2017 (8:00 PM - 9:45 PM) Location: Johnson Center Cinema - George Mason University (Fairfax Campus) The Gathering Weekly Service is held every Monday at 8pm! The service experience includes cool music and a speaker! Stay tuned on "The Gathering GMU" via Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and Text regarding location, events, and updates.
creator: The Gathering
title: The Gathering (Weekly Service)
location: Johnson Center Cinema - George Mason University (Fairfax Campus)
